Manufacturers and exporters of Welding electrodes and wires

Malu Electrodes manufactures and exports MS Electrodes, Low Hydrogen Electrodes, SS Electrodes, Hard Facing Electrodes, MIG Wire & other allied products.

Facebook-f Twitter Instagram

Our PRoduct Categories

M.S.Electrodes

Hard Facing Electrodes

Stainless Steel Electrodes

Cast Iron Electrodes

Mangalam MIG Wires

ABOUT US

Established in 1992,  Malu Electrodes is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company.

Our 12 state-of-the-art manufacturing units have a capacity of 97000 TPA of Welding Electrodes and 6500 TPA of MIG Wires.

With a widespread dealer network across India in states of Maharashtra, Gujarat, Goa, Madhya Pradesh, Andhra Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Karnataka, Chhattisgarh, Uttarakhand, Uttar Pradesh, Himachal Pradesh, Punjab, Haryana, Delhi, Rajasthan, Assam, West Bengal, and Odisha, we are all set to deliver products to you across the nation.

Trust

Products that never disappoint.

Quality

Superior quality. Always.

Service

Great Customer Service.

Scale

Abilty to manufacture at scale.
